lyrics:
15 contributorseach coming night lyricsverse 1
will you say when im gone away
my lover came to me and wed lay
in rooms unfamiliar but until now ohohohoh
until now ohohohoh
until now

verse 2
will you say to them when im gone
i loved your son for his sturdy arms
we both learned to cradle then live without ohohohoh
live without ohohohoh
live without

verse 3
will you say when im gone away
your fathers body was judgement day
we both dove and rose to the riverside ohohohoh
riverside ohohohoh
riverside

verse 4
will you say to me when im gone
your face has faded but lingers on
cause light strikes a deal with each coming night ohohohoh
coming night ohohohoh
coming night ohohohoh
see iron  wine liveget tickets as low as 60you might also likeoutro
coming night ohohohoh
coming night ohohohoh
